welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ingelheim, Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque vineyards, historical sites, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that Ingelheim has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited access for up to 24 hours.
